[ C usually singular ] (also goliath) a very large and powerful person or organization: the Goliath of The country is being seen as the Goliath (= the most powerful) of the region.
[ S not after the ] in the Bible, a giant (= extremely tall man) who was killed by the boy David throwing a stone at him
